actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide rules for the tax treatment of 1954 to provide rules for the tax treatment of employees under certain profit sharing plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend restricted qualification to certain profit-sharing plans which allow employees to elect current distributions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide rules for the tax treatment of 1954 to provide rules for the tax treatment of employees under certain profit sharing plans.
